subject: Re: [junit] Re: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
msgSnippet: ... OK. Please show us the CLASSPATH you ve used to launch the JUnit test runner, as well as the location of the file WPFStatDescriptor.class on your file
messageBody:
Jian Tang wrote:

> Did that, doesn't help.

OK. Please show us the CLASSPATH you've used to launch the JUnit test
runner, as well as the location of the file WPFStatDescriptor.class on
your file system. That should give us the answer.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
